Header: 267th model village vested in the people
Content: Minister Sajith Premadasa says that the country where all people can live freely will be created by devolving power to the maximum level in a unitary Sri Lanka. The Minister expressed those views during a function at the Ampara area. Minister Sajith Premadasa vested in the people the Alminagraamam reawakened village built at Pothuvil ,Sengamam area. It is the 267th model village vested in the people under the ‘Semata Sevana – Yali Pibidena’ reawakened village program. 26 million rupees has been spent to build the village consisting of 258 houses with all facilities.
